lead_paragraph: The elder Cruz was a salesman for Mannatech, a religiously inspired company whose history of questionable health claims has already popped up in the presidential race.

byline.contributor: Steve Eder and Paulina Villegas contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Cruz’s Father Worked for Supplements Maker That Was Sued by Investors
headline.main: Ted Cruz’s Father Worked With Supplements Maker Sued by Investors

snippet: The elder Cruz was a salesman for Mannatech, a religiously inspired company whose history of questionable health claims has already popped up in the presidential race.
abstract: Interviews and court records show that Sen Ted Cruz's father Rafael worked for Mannatech, controversial religiously inspired dietary supplement company, for quite some time; elder Cruz has never mentioned working for company in his otherwise detailed memoir and in his many speeches.
